text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Good meals are the foundation 
of horsegirls' health!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Train well, study smart, run fast… 
and eat good! These are the cornerstones 
of life at the academy!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Oh, good morning, Trainer! 
Ready for another day of toil?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Compost feeds the soil, and fertilizer 
feeds the crops! Remember to mix 
it all up well!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I will! Grow up well, little plants♪ 
Grow well and turn into yummy veggies～♪

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text:
Woah, look at its shine and lustre…! 
These veggies look amazing!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Alright! Then it's my turn to make them all into buono dishes～!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Cultivating, harvesting, cooking… 
These times they spend together 
are sure to remain with them.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
And therein lies our ultimate goal — for all 
horsegirls to live in health and happiness!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Another day awaits. Let us get 
down to it again, Trainer!
Harvest! Feast! The Great Food Festival.
